for Gabrielle Giffords . Shortly before the service, surrounded by her husband Mark Kelly, Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and her close friends Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz ( D-Fla.) and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.), she opened her eyes. She's in her hospital bed. I'm holding her hand, we're talking about how great she is and how inspiring she is. And we're talking about all the fun things we want to do. And she's squeezing my hand and I'm knowing that she's reacting. She's moving her leg and she's moving her arms. And we're getting so excited because we can see that she's really trying so hard to communicate with us. Dr. Peter Michael Lemole, the neurosurgeon who operated on Gabrielle Giffords , said Thursday that visit may have made all the difference. DETROIT-- Chrysler reported a$ 199 million net loss for the fourth quarter of 2010, but excluding interest on its government loans and other restructuring debts, it earned a$ 198 million operating profit. What Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne said. "However, our job is not yet done.
